sunchao commented on a change in pull request #2957: ARROW-3787: [Rust] Implement From<ListArray> for BinaryArray
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2957#discussion_r233734317
 
 

 ##########
 File path: rust/src/array.rs
 ##########
 @@ -585,6 +585,29 @@ impl<'a> From<Vec<&'a str>> for BinaryArray {
     }
 }
 
+/// Creates a `BinaryArray` from `List<u8>` array
+impl From<ListArray> for BinaryArray {
+    fn from(v: ListArray) -> Self {
+        assert_eq!(
+            v.data().child_data()[0].child_data().len(),
+            0,
+            "BinaryArray's can only be created from list array of u8 values (i.e. List<PrimitiveArray<u8>>)."
 
 Review comment:
   nit: `BinaryArray's` -> `BinaryArray`?

----------------------------------------------------------------
